intro: Join Lia on the Train of the Seasons and overcome magical challenges through the four seasons to restore harmony!
description:
Hop aboard the Train of Seasons with Lia! A mysterious whistle leads her to a secret station… and the adventure begins.

4 worlds to explore: Spring, Summer, Autumn, and Winter, each filled with color, surprises, and magic.

Super fun challenges: fix a wacky garden, win silly challenges, make a leaf laugh, and catch whispers on the wind.

Dances and celebrations: collect cards with warm ideas, mini-dances, and joyful winter parties.

Bright finale: when everything is back in balance, Lia arrives at the Station of Harmony… in the sky!
